# redisweb

A flask extension to support user view and manage redis with beautiful interface.


## Get Started

Installation is easy:
```
$ pip install redisweb
```

Start Server:
```
>>>redisweb
```

Now, you can go to http://127.0.0.1:5000/redisboard
